title: Never Too Late
description: The wildly anticipated second installment in the Table 21 series including Rick’s POV and what comes after In Too Deep, a novella featured in bestselling erotica Forbidden Fruit Vol. 1. When a deal between two sex addicts leads to nothing but trouble, Rick and Loraine rediscover their addictions. Both think it’s too late for love until Rick takes matters into his own hands.
author: Morgan Jane Mitchell
